note.p: Clergyman and barrister. LLB, Cambridge, 1859. Admitted at Lincoln’s Inn, 1847. Ordained priest, 1852. Curate of Norton-le-Moors, Staffordshire, 1852–4; vicar of Dodderhill with Elmbridge, Worcestershire, 1855–64; rector of Bisley, Surrey, 1865–72. Called to the bar, 1873. Provisional committee member of the Association of Liberal Thinkers, 1878.
letter from M. D. Conway, 18 November 1878
